name: Deios I // Directors Cut (EARLY ACCESS)
description:
Deios 1 is an arena shooter set in a surreal pixel art landscape. Players traverse through strange areas, challenging a series of arenas. Set in an alternative Internet world. The players uncover a mystery of what is the Deios BBS system invented by a strange interfaith cyber author. Themes of God.

PRESSKIT() HERE, Manifesto of DeityPunk Philosophy Here

How do you play?

Fight a series of bosses, gain experience points and use those experience points to craft new guns.

As you fight new bosses you gain new landscapes and access to other parts of the mysterious psychedelic spiritual world. 

Explore handcrafted pixel art landscapes with experimental glitch inspired .designs.
